headline: Amentum’s Nuclear Wins Raise Questions On Growth Versus Rich Valuation
summary: Amentum Holdings (NYSE:AMTM) has taken a key role in a multi year, full scale deep borehole nuclear waste disposal demonstration with Deep Isolation and Halliburton. The company recently secured major nuclear services contracts with Electricite de France in the UK. Amentum also joined a consortium that won a contract to support new build nuclear power in the Netherlands. Amentum is a global engineering and technical services firm, and these latest nuclear focused contracts put additional...

headline: Patterson-UTI Energy Q4 Loss Narrower Than Expected, Revenues Beat
summary: PTEN posts a narrower Q4 loss and beats revenue estimates as stronger Completion Services and lower costs lift results.

raw.headline: Patterson-UTI Energy Q4 Loss Narrower Than Expected, Revenues Beat
raw.summary: PTEN posts a narrower Q4 loss and beats revenue estimates as stronger Completion Services and lower costs lift results.

headline: SLB Secures $1.5 Billion Contract for Mutriba Field Development
summary: SLB secures a $1.5 billion, five-year contract from Kuwait Oil Company to design and manage production at the complex Mutriba oil field in Kuwait.

raw.headline: SLB Secures $1.5 Billion Contract for Mutriba Field Development
raw.summary: SLB secures a $1.5 billion, five-year contract from Kuwait Oil Company to design and manage production at the complex Mutriba oil field in Kuwait.

headline: Marathon Q4 Earnings & Revenues Beat Estimates, Expenses Down Y/Y
summary: MPC, a Findlay, OH-based oil and gas refining and marketing company, expects refining operating costs to average $5.85 per barrel in the first quarter of 2026.

raw.headline: Marathon Q4 Earnings & Revenues Beat Estimates, Expenses Down Y/Y
raw.summary: MPC, a Findlay, OH-based oil and gas refining and marketing company, expects refining operating costs to average $5.85 per barrel in the first quarter of 2026.
